1.title: EVM smart contract to archive files on-chain

about.heading: About Me
about.bio:
I'm a 26-year-old developer driven by curiosity and coherence between technology and meaning. After graduating with a European Master’s in Computer Science (FinTech specialization), I joined Prepar-Vie to contribute to digital transformation and rethink how software can serve both efficiency and transparency.

My path bridges AI, Web3, cybersecurity and finance — but also philosophy, sociology and aeronautics. I believe real innovation emerges when worlds intersect.

I’m driven by a simple idea: technology should enhance human freedom, not replace it.

build.name: Build
build.review: Since I learned how to code, I’ve been fascinated by building my own projects—especially since discovering Web3 and blockchain.

learn.name: Learn
learn.review: I’m deeply into cryptography, cybersecurity, blockchain and decentralized tech, and I want to learn as much as I can.

fly.name: Fly
fly.review: My biggest passion right now. I want to get my Private Pilot Licence for both planes and helicopters. Flying is the ultimate feeling.

travel.name: Travel
travel.review: I love traveling—my goal is to explore the world and discover new cultures, places and inspiring people.

succeed.name: Succeed
succeed.review: I want to innovate, learn, fail… and succeed! After missing out on the French Air Force, I know I want to create value and build companies.
